Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class BinaryExpr

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Expression
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.BinaryExpr
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddingExpr, LogicalExpr, MultiplyingExpr, RelationalExpr
public abstract class BinaryExpr extends Expression
Base class for all binary expressions. A binary expression is an expression of the form "expression operator expression". The first expression is called the left operand, and the second expression is called the right operand.
